title: New: PUSHER – Clear (Feat. Mothica)
body:
Almost sounds like this new track from _PUSHER_ has a Hundred Waters sample in it.

Anyway, it’s the most exciting track from the producer so far, calling in the vocal talents of **Mothica**; _Clear_ is a glorious taste of the summer to come. Check it below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
